package.name: nuxeo-agenda
package.title: Nuxeo Agenda
package.description: The Nuxeo Agenda addon enables to bind documents to events in agendas. The plugin is designed to let you add the ``agenda`` capability to your own document types thanks to the usage of a facet. The goal is typically to organise comittee session and display all documents / topics at stake for the meeting. There is no integration with any mainstream calendar management solution such as Google Calendar or Microsoft Outlook.
